metadata.title: QuickDevTools - Professional Free Developer Tools
metadata.description: Comprehensive toolkit for developers. Format JSON, encode Base64, URL encoding/decoding, timestamp conversion, diff comparison, QR code generation, color picker, regex tester, hash generation, character counter, UUID generation, Markdown preview, and more. All tools run in your browser with local processing for security. Free to use.
metadata.keywords: developer tools, JSON formatter, Base64 encoder, URL encoder, decoder, timestamp converter, UNIX time, diff, QR code generator, color picker, regex tester, hash generator, MD5, SHA-256, character counter, UUID generator, Markdown preview, free tools, online tools

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: A collection of tools to streamline your development workflow. Choose the one that fits your needs.
tools.notFoundDescription: Try changing your search criteria or adjusting the category filters.
tools.newToolsDescription: All tools run in your browser and no data is sent to any server.

format.title: Universal Formatter
format.description: Format and beautify JSON, YAML, SQL, XML, and more.

timestamp.title: UNIX Timestamp Converter
timestamp.description: Convert between UNIX timestamps and human-readable date/time.

urlEncoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
urlEncoder.description: Encode and decode URL strings with ease.

characterCount.title: Character Counter
characterCount.description: Count characters, words, and bytes in your text with detailed analysis.

uuidGenerator.title: UUID Generator
uuidGenerator.description: Easily generate UUID v1, v4, and Nil UUIDs.

markdownPreview.title: Markdown Preview
markdownPreview.description: Preview Markdown in real-time. Supports GitHub Flavored Markdown and HTML export.
